purpose.summary: The CCPAURLY copybook defines a COBOL data structure at level 05 named implicitly as a group for Pending Authorization Response (PA-RL fields). It includes fields for card number (16 chars), transaction ID (15 chars), auth ID code (6 chars), auth response code (2 chars), auth response reason (4 chars), and approved amount (signed numeric with 10 integer digits, 2 decimals). This structure holds response data from payment authorization requests, as indicated by the header comments.
purpose.business_context: Payment processing for pending card authorizations, likely in e-commerce or financial systems handling transaction approvals (copyright Amazon.com).
